CurrentIssues.ID: MultilineLambdaItParameter:MmApp.kt${ val usePreciseLocation = it.contains(Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION) LaunchedEffect(Unit) { scope.launch(Dispatchers.IO) { val priority = if (usePreciseLocation) { Priority.PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY } else { Priority.PRIORITY_BALANCED_POWER_ACCURACY } val result = locationClient .getCurrentLocation( priority, CancellationTokenSource().token, ).await() result?.let { res -> onLocationUpdated(res) } } } }
